components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Econet Network in Zimbawe

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Econet Network in Zimbabwe. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to GrameenPhone Network in Bangladesh

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to GrameenPhone Network in Bangladesh. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 March 2023 at 12:00 PST until 06 March 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 06 March 2024 at 12:00 PST until 06 March 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 March 2024 at 13:00 PST until 06 March 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 March 2024 at 18:00 PST until 07 March 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 March 2024 at 20:00 PST until 07 March 2024 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Bangladesh SMS Carrier Maintenance - Robi (Robi Axiata Ltd)

incident_updates.body: The Robi (Robi Axiata Ltd) network in Bangladesh is conducting an emergency maintenance from 07 March 2024 at 10:00 PST until 07 March 2024 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Robi (Robi Axiata Ltd) Bangladesh handsets.

The XL network in Indonesia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 March 2024 at 14:00 PST until 07 March 2024 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from XL Indonesia handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Switzerland is conducting an emergency maintenance from 07 March 2024 at 14:00 PST until 07 March 2024 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Twilio phone number in below countries:

Azerbaijan, Bangladesh, Bermuda, Croatia, Indonesia, Israel, Mexico, Myanmar, Nepal, Philippines, Slovenia, Uzbekistan.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - KPN

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner KPN is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 March 2024 at 13:00 PST until 09 March 2024 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for KPN customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.
